name: HitBird - A challenging flight
description:
A classic theme with HitBird fun!, an addictive and challenging game that requires patience to achieve maximum pass through worlds full of obstacles, extreme natural forces and enigmantes magic items that will power or complexity to your route!

Game features:

Complexity
Our mission is to balance the difficulty with the ability to win, but this is not easy, you understand the operation cost of each enigmatic object and the consequences that everyone will.

NATURAL FORCES
We know it is difficult to predict the times today however HitBird is worse, you will face storms, tornadoes, rain, snow, earthquakes and much more plowing your way almost impossible to overcome.

To follow ... best we leave some images of HitBird that an image is worth a thousand words ..
